title: Cartelle unificate
content: Buon giorno se attivo la spunta delle cartelle unificate ,in posta in arrivo e in bozze non compaiono le cartelle degli account e non ci sono messaggi di spunta . Ho cercato nelle proprietà della cartella con il tasto destro del mouse ma non vi è possibilità di scegliere le cartelle da visualizzare

title: In Thunderbird I hide folder pane header, but how can I redisplay it
content: In Thunderbird I hide folder pane header, but how can I redisplay it. I cannot find setting about it.

title: version 115.2.2 does not work at all
content:
I upgraded to version 115.2.2 (on my Mac Air with Monterey), and it does not work at all: the window does not show the messages. It is the same for all 3 mail accounts. Here is the error message: "One of the following (imap) is not a registered protocol or is not allowed in this context."

It worked normally (although it was very slow) until I upgraded. (On my iPhone, I receive messages - fortunately, since otherwise I would not have been able to create an account to get support).


Regards, Zoe Chatzidakis
creator: zoe2

title: Odinstalovat novou verzi Supernova
content: Prosím existuje bezpečný způsob, jak odinstalovat verzi Supernova a vrátit se k té poslední předchozí, aniž by člověk přišel o stažené a uložené e-maily? Je to z mého pohledu hrozný krok bokem, na jednu stranu nechci Thunderbird zrušit úplně, ale než používat tuhle strašnou verzi, to fakt raději odejdu. Ale mám Thunderbird rád, prosím, lze to odinstalovat a vrátit se zpět?
creator: martin1980aa

title: Configuring "Supernova" folder pane
content:
Hello, I was trying out the new options with Supernova's email folder pane, showing folder size, number of messages in the folder, and so on.

One of the options was hiding the mini-toolbar at the top of the pane, which normally has the additional get messages and new message buttons. (I'm not talking about the main Thunderbird toolbar, which has Get Messages, Write, Chat and so on—I mean the small one that appears at the top of the folder pane. I'll attach a screenshot to make it clear what I'm talking about.)

I tried hiding the mini-toolbar, but now I can't get it back, because the menu for doing so is on the toolbar which I just hid. I'm not sure if there is an option to re-enable the mini-toolbar somewhere else, and I just can't see it, or if the existence of this trap is a bug in the UI design.

Can anyone help? Thanks in advance.
creator: pete113

title: problém s přihlášením v Thunderbirdu
content: Od včerejšího dne se mi nedaří přihlásit na Thunderbirdu k poště na serveru pop.3.seznam.cz (ke gmailu a iol.cz to jde bez problémů). Pošta Seznamu.cz je pro mě velmi důležitá. Stále se mi objevují chybová hlášení, zkusil jsem změnit heslo, ale bez úspěchu. Můžete mi pomoci? Moc děkuji - Bedřich Taláb
creator: btalab

title: Thunderbird 15.2.2 - wrong message header and other issues
content:
Since upgrading to 15.2.2, I find that

1) some emails display the wrong header - or no header at all (image attached);

2) inboxes on some accounts do not show the number of unread messages until I click on the Inbox line/s in those folders;

3) some messages are disappearing; I can find them on other devices but not on my laptop.

Any ideas? Are these common issues? Thanks.

John964

title: When deleting an email, another email higher up in the list - which isn't selected - also gets deleted
content:
When I go through my email list, I delete the currently highlighted (selected) email by using the delete button or clicking on the delete button above the email message.

As I do this, every few messages, instead of just the selected email being deleted, another email higher up the list (newer in the list) also gets deleted.

I have noticed this with a recent update of Thunderbird in the last month or two.
creator: neilnjt

content:

Thanks!
